WHAT: Job Application

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Ok.
RECRUITER: What are your other relevant skills?
ANSWER: My other relevant skills include painting. I have experience in various painting techniques and have created several art pieces.

ANSWER: I have a Bachelor's degree in Music.
RECRUITER: What is your bachelor background?
ANSWER: My bachelor's degree is in Music.
RECRUITER: How many years have you worked in industry positions?
ANSWER: I have two years of industry experience.
RECRUITER: Please tell me when you could start working for us.
ANSWER: I am available to start working from September.
